verses.text: \w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* when we \w could|strong="G4722"\w* no \w longer|strong="G3371"\w* \w forbear|strong="G4722"\w*, we thought it \w good|strong="G2106"\w* to be \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Athens|strong="G0116"\w* \w alone|strong="G3441"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w*, \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fellowlabourer|strong="G4904"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w establish|strong="G4741"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3588"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* should be \w moved|strong="G4525"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w afflictions|strong="G2347"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we are \w appointed|strong="G2749"\w* \w thereunto|strong="G5124"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w verily|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* we \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, we \w told|strong="G4302"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w before|strong="G4302"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w should|strong="G3195"\w* suffer \w tribulation|strong="G2346"\w*; \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w cause|strong="G1223"\w*, when \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w could|strong="G4722"\w* no \w longer|strong="G3371"\w* \w forbear|strong="G4722"\w*, I \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, lest by some \w means|strong="G3381"\w* the \w tempter|strong="G3985"\w* have \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w labour|strong="G2873"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w* \w when|strong="G2064"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G2097"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* good \w tidings|strong="G2097"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w remembrance|strong="G3417"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w*, desiring \w greatly|strong="G1971"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w as|strong="G2509"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add to see\add* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*:

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, we were \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w distress|strong="G0318"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*:

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* we \w live|strong="G2198"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* stand \w fast|strong="G4739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2169"\w* can \w we|strong="G1410"\w* \w render|strong="G0467"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w again|strong="G0467"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w wherewith|strong="G3739"\w* we \w joy|strong="G5463"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G5209"\w* \w sakes|strong="G1223"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w Night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w praying|strong="G1189"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="G4057"\w* \w that|strong="G1519"\w* we might \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* might \w perfect|strong="G2675"\w* that which is \w lacking|strong="G5303"\w* in \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*?

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w direct|strong="G2720"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w make|strong="G4121"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* to \w increase|strong="G4121"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* in \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2509"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \add do\add* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*:

To the \w end|strong="G1519"\w* he may \w stablish|strong="G4741"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w unblameable|strong="G0273"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w holiness|strong="G0042"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.
